attributes.action: harden media and video games censorship.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
...youth crime convictions rise by a fifth in one year...

...15yr. old student brought two guns to school and shot six students at random...

...18yr. and 17yr old, walked through their high school firing guns and killing anyone whose beliefs differed from their...

...Seven and 8 year-old brothers and an 11 year-old friend were arrested for kidnapping, beating and sexually assaulting a 3 year-old girl...

...13yr. and 11yr. old, allegedly shot and killed four students and one teacher ambushed during a fire drill at their school...

...A gang of teenage savages drugged and raped a mum in front of her children – and then posted a film of the attack on YouTube...

Do I need to continue ?

I blame video games, media and television for violence in our society.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
